task.prompt: Write a function to find the median of two sorted arrays of same size.
task.gold:
def get_median(arr1, arr2, n):
  i = 0
  j = 0
  m1 = -1
  m2 = -1
  count = 0
  while count < n + 1:
    count += 1
    if i == n:
      m1 = m2
      m2 = arr2[0]
      break
    elif j == n:
      m1 = m2
      m2 = arr1[0]
      break
    if arr1[i] <= arr2[j]:
      m1 = m2
      m2 = arr1[i]
      i += 1
    else:
      m1 = m2
      m2 = arr2[j]
      j += 1
  return (m1 + m2)/2

Final code:
def get_median(arr1, arr2, n):
  i = 0
  j = 0
  m1 = -1
  m2 = -1
  count = 0
  while count < n + 1:
    count += 1
    if i == n:
      m1 = m2
      m2 = arr2[0]
      break
    elif j == n:
      m1 = m2
      m2 = arr1[0]
      break
    if arr1[i] <= arr2[j]:
      m1 = m2
      m2 = arr1[i]
      i += 1
    else:
      m1 = m2
      m2 = arr2[j]
      j += 1
  return (m1 + m2)/2
